# Pull Request - WebKernel Content

## Scope Compliance Checklist

Before submitting, please verify your contribution meets WebKernel scope requirements:

- [ ] Content is **public-facing** and suitable for open distribution
- [ ] Content is **educational** or **interpretive** in nature
- [ ] Content does **NOT** include canon/specifications
- [ ] Content does **NOT** include governance/policies
- [ ] Content does **NOT** include UICH implementations
- [ ] Content does **NOT** include hash-based references
- [ ] Content does **NOT** make metaphysical or authority claims
- [ ] All **PortusSophia™** references include the ™ symbol
- [ ] Markdown is **clean** and well-structured
- [ ] Tone is **accessible** and educational

## Description

Please describe your changes:

## Type of Change

- [ ] New documentation
- [ ] Update to existing documentation
- [ ] Fix/correction
- [ ] Improvement to clarity
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Out-of-Scope Warning

If your content includes canon, governance, UICH, or hash references, it belongs in a different repository. Please contact the appropriate internal channel for guidance.

---

Thank you for contributing to the PortusSophia™ WebKernel!
